import React, {useEffect,useState} from 'react' import TopNav from '../components/TopNav' import { Container, Card, Table } from 'react-bootstrap' import { getStudents } from '../services/api' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Students(){ const [list, setList] = useState([]) const nav = useNavigate() useEffect(() => { getStudents() .then(d => setList(Array.isArray(d) ? d : [])) .catch(() => setList([])); // only fail when API fails }, []); return ( <>
Students
{list.map((s,i)=>( ))}
#NameDistrictAcademicAction
{i+1} {s.name} {s.district} {s.academicScore || s.academic_score}
) }
